name: ONE TO ONE COACHING
description: A one to one health and lifestyle overhaul for people who need the extra accountability and guidance to reach their goals.

name: WHEEL ALIGNMENT
description: ​Transform your mindset in as little as 5 weeks - Set meaningful goals, change your habits, gain willpower and boost motivation.

name: 3D BODY SCANNING
description: A FIT3D scan is a great way to know your starting point & track your progress over time, whether it's weight loss, improving your posture.

name: NUTRITION COACHING
description: Get a handle on your nutrition once and for all with extensive nutrition and habit coaching to ensure you stay on track.

name: CONFIDENCE BOOST
description: The side effects of ageing can leave you feeling unhappy with the way you look. Our strength training plans will see you lose body fat, build strong muscles.

name: QUALITY OF LIFE
description: Expert Personal Training will improve your quality of life by giving you the fitness. The fitter you are, the more of life’s joys you can experience.
